meanings.definition: Marked with bands that cross each other.
meanings.sent1: The table had a crossbanded design on its surface.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a crossbanded pattern to decorate the vase.
meanings.sent3: The crossbanded curtains made the room look stylish.
meanings.sent4: Her crossbanded scarf added a unique touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The crossbanded border on the rug caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Having bands that cross each other.
meanings.sent1: The crossbanded belt was a fashionable accessory.
meanings.sent2: The crossbanded fence added charm to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The crossbanded straps on the bag were very sturdy.
meanings.sent4: His crossbanded shoes stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The crossbanded handle on the drawer was easy to grip.

meanings.definition: To mark with bands that cross each other.
meanings.sent1: She crossbanded the gift box with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crossbanded the edges of the table.
meanings.sent3: He crossbanded the map to highlight the important areas.
meanings.sent4: They crossbanded the document for easy reference.
meanings.sent5: The artist crossbanded the canvas before painting.
